MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the LL30 postcode area of Llandudno. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6:04am. Our engineers are on their way to the local area to investigate a suspected blown fuse and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9:15am. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:23am on 16th October
